mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from comm where commId = ${commId} and boardType = ${boardType}
mapper.insert: insert into comm values (#{commId}, #{userId}, #{content}, ref_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{boardType})
mapper.update: update petboard set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}

update petboard set tel = #{tel}, content = #{content}, place = #{place}, petName = #{petName}, petGender = #{petGender}, petType=#{petType}, petDate = #{petDate}, petImg = #{petImg}, petDetail = #{petDetail} where postId = #{postId}
update petboard set postDisable = 1 where postId = #{postId}
